credit_line: Gift of George W. George, Class of 1941
title: Red Valentine
medium: graphite | ink | white ink | on paper
inscriptions: u.c. in pencil: KHRUSHY; u.c. in ink: RED VALENTINE; u.l. in pencil: KHRUSHY; c.l. in image in ink: RUBE/ GOLDBERG; l.l. in pencil: 2 Col Cut/ 2:30 pm today; l.r. in crayon: 5 1/2: [crossed out in pencil]; l.r. in ink: FOR FEB. 14 [crossed out in pencil]; l.r. in pencil: 488 [crossed out]; verso l.l. in pencil: 93[encircled]; verso l.r.: [remenant of pink label]
